Title: A FREE and SIMPLE ASP.NET weather control you can customize (VB)
Description:
This ascx control displays current weather and weather forecast data on your ASP.NET website straight from an XML feed on weather.com. This is very easy to implement and extremely easy to customize. All you need to do is set a few variables and you're up and running.

Very Important:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
You must first register on weather.com to obtain your own License Key and Partner ID
- https://registration.weather.com/ursa/xmloap/
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Once you have registered with weather.com, download the source files which include:

- default.aspx (shows you how to implement the control)
- WeatherControl.ascx (the control itself)
- css/stylesheet.css (the stylesheet used to make it all look pretty)
- ccicons folder (the images used to display the forecast)
- readme.txt (instructions on how to use the control)

You should be good to go after that. If you have any questions, post them to this message board.
HomeWiki:
